Mixing begins with good audio and decent level management. It doesn't have to be complicated. What are you mixing? https://t.co/sqU0qHNtaG
The good programs are the ones you can use. Mac or Win? https://t.co/pliirshcjq
Piano Roll: Function Menu: MIDI Tranform: Doublespeed: Operate Only: Then duplicate them once. https://t.co/hdNwQWv6yr
You can learn all of the fundamentals using Audacity. Is there a particular struggle I can help with? https://t.co/ERNrAqz6fa
Happy to help :-) Any questions? https://t.co/3iXGi42kVn
